item.title: AKUMIN INC 10-K
item.description: AKUMIN INC, which is in the Services-Medical Laboratories [8071] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 16, 2022 had 39843 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 394 instances financial - 361 instances 2021 - 341 instances may - 338 instances december - 266 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
